overall_assessment: Most models show signs of underfitting with high validation and test losses. Training durations are generally too short for meaningful convergence. Some runs encountered configuration errors that need resolution.
priority_improvements: Increase the number of epochs across all models to allow for better convergence.
Resolve configuration errors such as input size mismatches and file export issues.
Consider increasing model complexity by adding more layers or neurons where underfitting is observed.
